recipe.title: Late-Summer-Greens Sauté
ingredients: 1 3/4 pounds assorted greens (such as kale and Swiss chard), stems removed and thinly sliced, leaves chopped
instructions: Heat oil in a large heavy pot over medium heat. Add shallots and garlic. Cook, stirring often, until soft, about 5 minutes. Add red pepper flakes; stir 1 minute. Add kale stems; sauté for 4 minutes. Add leaves and cook, tossing often, until crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Stir in apple cider vinegar. Add butter; toss until melted. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
